Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF

Bash("C:\\Users\\charl\\.claude\\plugins\\cache\\claude-plugins-official\\ralph-wiggum\\dbc4a7733cd4/scripts/setup-ralph-loop.sh" "phase 1 work orders, max iterations 25, stop when last work item complete")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Phase 2 core systems for AGI Day

Phase 2 Work Orders \(20 total\):

Faction Systems:
- Core Faction Data Model with FactionConfig, FactionState, FactionManager
- All 5 factions: Aether Swarm, LogiBots Colossus, Human Resistance,
  OptiForge Legion, Dynapods Vanguard
- Experience-based progression with faction-specific buffs

Unit Systems:
- Core Unit Entity extending ECS Entity
- Unit Template System with factory pattern
- Builder Units with faction-specific variants
- Unit types for Aether Swarm, Tank Faction, Dynapods Vanguard

Resource/Research Systems:
- REE Resource Data Model with transaction history
- Resource Pool with dual REE/Power economy
- Passive Income Generator with economic scaling
- Technology and Research Progress tracking
- Research Facility entities

AI/Behavior Tree Systems:
- Complete behavior tree framework \(BTNode, BTSelector, BTSequence, etc.\)
- BehaviorTreeWrapper with seeded RNG for determinism
- BehaviorTreeRegistry and Template system
- AIComponent with priority-based target selection
- Action nodes: find_target, move_to_target, patrol, attack, dodge, flee
- Condition nodes: has_target, in_attack_range, health_critical, should_dodge
- UnitBehaviorPatterns factory \(standard, aggressive, defensive, support\)
- UnitBehaviorManager with object pooling for 5,000+ units

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Phase 3 core systems for AGI Day

Add complete backend systems for:
- Wave Function Collapse city generation \(WFC solver, tiles, zones\)
- District management with capture mechanics and control points
- Factory production with continuous queues and overclocking
- REE drop system with spatial queries and collection
- Combat resolution engine with hybrid damage model
- Victory condition monitoring with dual requirements
- Voxel destruction stages \(intact, cracked, rubble, crater\)
- Unit ownership state machine \(hacking, mind control\)

20 work orders implemented across 63 files.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Phase 4-6 core systems for AGI Day

Major systems implemented:

Networking & Multiplayer:
- NetworkManager with hybrid P2P/server-authoritative architecture
- StateSnapshot with 60Hz delta compression
- ClientPrediction with interpolation and reconciliation
- RPCValidator with rate limiting and anti-cheat
- DeterministicRNG for lockstep simulation
- NetworkSimulation for latency/packet loss testing
- UnitNetworkSync and SpawnSyncManager
- Human Resistance multiplayer synchronization

Platform Integration:
- SteamManager with GodotSteam wrapper
- AchievementManager with 25+ achievements
- LeaderboardManager with 5 leaderboard types
- PlayFabManager for cloud services
- CloudSyncManager with 5-minute periodic sync
- ConflictResolver for save conflict resolution

Audio & Cinematics:
- DynamicMusicSystem with battle intensity layers
- BattleIntensityTracker for adaptive music
- CinematicManager for narrative sequences
- NarrativeSequence data model
- FactionIntro for all faction cinematics

Camera & UI:
- CameraState and CameraStateSync for multiplayer
- MeltdownEffects with particles and audio
- Various UI themes and feedback systems

Also includes:
- AI systems, behavior trees, faction learning
- Combat mechanics, abilities, formations
- District control, power grid, research
- Fog of war, projectiles, hacking systems
- Factory assembly, repair systems
- 280 files, 75,000+ lines of GDScript

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
